***

**Hi, my name is Doyin Elugbadebo. I am a Software Developer and an Information Systems Practitioner** based in Lagos, Nigeria. I obtained a B.Sc. degree in System Engineering and M.Sc. Programme in Information Technology, both from the Prestigious University of Lagos, Akoka, Yaba, Nigeria. I maintain multidisciplianry roles including the CEO of [Krystallux Optimum Systems](#), an App Architect at [Krystalnet Technology Solutions](#) and principal Instructor at [Krystallux Academy](#). I also act as a consultant to various tech companies including - a GIS & Data Mining Expert at [Microclipse Limited](#) and a Technology Expert at [Digital Hub Africa](#). Learn more about me [Here](http://doyinelugbadebo.com).

</br>

#### My Qualities
* 	Typical of my intrinsic style, I possess a vibrant business and strategic planning skills, pedagogically sound and  always strive to render a clean impact in any project involved in.
* 	With brilliant adeptness for intricate designs. I carved out performance as my watchword; highly innovative, love teamwork zealotry and can dynamically work efficiently under little or no supervision.

</br>

#### My Skills

* Web-scraping with BeautifulSoap, Scrapy and Selenium
* Years of hand-on experience with Microsoft office packages (Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Visio)
* Excellent Quality Assurance skills, including Six Sigma, PDCA, KPIs, Continuous Improvement and Lean Manufacturing
* Exquisite expertise in Geographic Information System (GIS) Modelling using R, Geoda, ArcGIS & Phyton. Usage areas include spatial econometrics, geospatial modelling, thematic mapping, geo-referencing and network analysis.
* Strong proficiency with latest web technologies such as: HTML5, CSS3, EcmaScript and its Frameworks (*AngularJS, React, EmberJS and Vue.JS*), PHP, Ruby on Rails and content management systems in the likes of wordpreess, joomla, magento and drupal.
* Hands-on experience with Project Management PRINCE-2 and Microsoft Project Professional
* Brilliant hands-on expertise in analyzing, estimating, simulating, modeling and forecasting of statistical/big data analytics and Bayesian statistics using tools like R Statistical, Phyton, openBUGs, winBugs, MATLAB, SmartPLS and ArcGIS.

</br>

#### Work eXperience

Infosys (A Multimedia ICT Development Company), Benin City, Edo State. Nigeria. [March 2014 - January 2017]

**Job Title:** Front End Developer/Business Intelligence Analyst

**Job Roles:**

* Designed, tested and deployed web-based applications using python and PHP language.
* Documented and tracked the status of project's milestones, challenges, and alternative resolutions to provide management with useful and accurate operational data.
* Liaised extensively with internal and external clients
* Determined and negotiated in-house quality procedures, standards and/or specifications

**Technologies:** MS Office Suite, Laravel, Django, PHP, MySQL, MATLAB, Phyton,  Microsoft Visio and SmartPLS

**Achievements:**

* Introduced requirement analysis into every major project won by the company by implementing top-notch industry-based techniques including three-tier architectural designs, the concept of activity timelines (Gantt), net maps, interoperability, maintainability and extensibility. With these procedures, I achieved a professional project milestone tracking and fast customer solutions. Also, the company recorded a turnover of over three hundred percent (300%) - an unprecedented feat in the history of the company.
* Effectively managed the company web portal for upgrade and patches. Also re-branded the company global image creating a marketing social-media pages.
* Designed, developed and implemented a first prized customized in-house calculator - A fun software development competition.

#### Opensoure Matters
1. **Machine Learning Textbooks:** Technology has taken over and facilitates almost our everyday routines. More would be achieved through indepth research in **Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence**. Nigerians are currently lacking in this field, even the few experts are the Academicians focusing mainly on the theoretical aspect of machine learning. I therefore came up with the idea of helping more Nigerians embrace and follow this near futuristic field by producing a more practically oriented Machine Learning textbook. Two textbooks would be produced written in both [R-statistical](http://www.CRAN.org) and the [Python](http://www.python-ml.com) languages respectively. The draft of the [outline](#) has begun. it would be made an online readable version using [R-bookdown](http://www.bookdown.com) package. e-pdf and printed copies would be published using [Packt Publishing](http://www.packt.com). Please forke this page for suggestions, recommendations and contributions.

2. **Machine Learning Kaggle Boilerplates:** Academicians focusing mainly on the theoretical aspect of machine learning. I therefore came up with the idea of helping more Nigerians embrace and follow this near futuristic field by producing a more practically oriented Machine Learning textbook
